scripts.test: base64 testPayload.json > encodedTestPayload && aws lambda invoke --function-name getPubmedArticles --payload file://encodedTestPayload --no-cli-auto-prompt  outfile.js && cat outfile.js | cut -c -500
scripts.upload: zip -r function.zip index.js node_modules/ && aws lambda update-function-code --no-cli-auto-prompt --function-name getPubmedArticles --zip-file fileb://function.zip && sleep 10s && npm test
